game.name: 三国俱乐部
game.shortDescription: Choose various factions from the Three Kingdoms period to run your club, hire, trade and cultivate military generals, and strive to compete in high-level leagues and cup tournaments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Choose various factions from the Three Kingdoms period to run your club, hire, trade and cultivate military generals, and strive to compete in high-level leagues and cup tournaments.
